socialMedia.title: üöó Ford Die-Cast Collection at Tiny Fords
socialMedia.description: Drive into the world of Ford die-cast cars with Tiny Fords! Hot Wheels, Matchbox and more, all in one place.

entries.content: Welcome to Tiny Fords, the website of a Ford die-cast car enthusiast. Here, you'll find my collection of Hot Wheels, Matchbox, and other small scale models of your many Ford cars. Our easy-to-use website makes it simple to navigate and find the cars, this is mainly so we can avoid buying duplicates and keep our collection up-to-date. Let's dive in and explore the collection together!
Currently there are items within the various collections!

text: Ah, the Duplicates section of Tiny Fords! Even the most meticulous collectors encounter duplicates now and then. Here, you'll find the models that have been inadvertently added to the collection more than once. While they might be duplicates to me, they could be the missing piece in another collector's ensemble. Explore and see if there's a hidden gem you've been searching for!

metadata.title: üöó About Tiny Fords - Ford Die-Cast Car Collection
metadata.description: Learn more about Tiny Fords and our Ford die-cast car collection. Find out how we keep track of our collection and avoid buying duplicates.

socialMedia.title: üöó Tiny Fords: The Story Behind Our Die-Cast Obsession
socialMedia.description: Learn the story behind why we created Tiny Fords and our die-cast car collection.

text: Welcome to Tiny Fords. My name is Kevin, and I'm the creator of this website. I've been collecting Ford die-cast cars for years, and I created this website as a tool to keep track of my collection.

As my collection grew, I found myself buying duplicates and missing out on cars I wanted to add to my collection. I realized that I needed a way to easily and quickly navigate my collection online, so I wouldn't make these mistakes anymore. That's when I decided to create Tiny Fords.

The website is a non-commercial site and it was created by me for myself, but I decided to share it with others as I thought we might be able to swap duplicates or identify cars I have not yet in my collection. With Tiny Fords, I can browse Hot Wheels, Matchbox, and other car models easily, and avoid buying duplicates.

The website was created using a Cloudflare Worker on a free account. I chose this platform because it was easy to use and it was free. I'm proud to say it was made in 2023. I didn't use any framework, it was all done by me. It was challenging, but I was determined to make it happen.

In the future, I plan to add more features and improvements to the website, such as a "Want List" page, where I can keep track of the cars I'm looking for. I also plan to keep the collection up-to-date with new additions.
Thank you for visiting Tiny Fords. I hope you enjoy exploring my collection as much as I do. If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out to me via the contact page.

name: How to find the toy number
h1: How to find the toy number

metadata.title: üîç How to find the toy number of a car - Tiny Fords
metadata.description: Discover how to find the toy number of a car at Tiny Fords. Learn how to navigate our collection and find the cars you are looking for.

breadcrumbList: How to find the toy number

socialMedia.title: üîç Find Your Favorite Cars in a Snap
socialMedia.description: Quickly find the die-cast cars you love (and in our collection) with our easy search tips.

text: You can use various codes to search for and identify cars in our collection. These codes can also be used on other websites such as eBay to quickly locate the car.

To get the best results, follow these steps:

  1. Locate the toy code
  2. Enter the code in the search bar
  3. Check if the returned results match the car you're looking for
  4. If no results are returned, the car may not be in the collection yet
  5. If you're not sure, search for the car's name to confirm its absence

Matchbox and Hot Wheels cars have a code on the back of their packaging, sometimes also on the front. Usually, it is found at the top of the backcard, and is a combination of three letters and two numbers (e.g. 'GTB91').

textImage.alt: Rear packaging of a Hot Wheels case with the toy code encircled in red

text: Premium cars may have their code located differently, such as closer to the barcode on the back of the packaging.

textImage.alt: Rear packaging of a Hot Wheels Premium case with the toy code encircled in red

text: Matchbox Power Grab boxes don't have the usual backcard. Instead, the code can be found on the bottom near the barcode.

textImage.alt: Bottom packaging of a Matchbox Power Grab box with the toy code encircled in red

metadata.title: ‚õëÔ∏è KLAS Car Keepers - Ford Die-Cast Car Collection
metadata.description: Keeping my collection safe with KLAS Car keepers. Sustainable and strong: perfect protection for my collection!

socialMedia.title: ‚õëÔ∏è Protecting my collection with KLAS Car Keepers
socialMedia.description: The perfect solution to keep your die-cast (1:64) collection is pristine condition - the strong and sustainable Car Keepers from KLAS.

entries.content: If you're anything like me, you'll understand the importance of keeping our prized die-cast cars in pristine condition. That's where KLAS Car Keepers come in. Based in Essex, KLAS has created these top-quality protectors that I've come to rely on for my collection. Not only do they offer stellar protection, but they're also eco-friendly - a big thumbs up in my book! Whether you're a seasoned collector or just starting out, let's explore how KLAS Car Keepers can make a difference for our tiny treasures.

Nestled in Essex (UK), KLAS is not just any company - it's a passion project by a fellow collector who totally gets our collectible obsession! Their protectors? Top-tier, if you ask me. And here's the cherry on top: KLAS is all about going green. Every protector is made from recyclable materials, and even their packaging gets the eco-friendly nod with recycled boxes and padding; a perfect blend of quality and eco-consciousness!

content: High-Quality Material: KLAS Car Keepers are made from thick recyclable PET plastic, ensuring they are durable and protective.
Sustainability: Unlike other manufacturers who use non-recyclable PVC, KLAS uses fully recyclable polyethylene terephthalate (PET), the same material used in drinking bottles.
Clamshell Folding Design: This design offers complete and secure protection for unopened collectable cars, encasing both the blister and card, shielding them from damage, condensation, and dust.
Easy Access: Each protector is easy to open and reseal, offering a crystal clear window to view the model inside.
Storage & Display: KLAS Car Keepers are stackable for easy storage. They also come with a hanger holder hole for those who wish to display their collection.

intro.content: KLAS Car Keepers Short Card protective cases are a must-have for every Hot Wheels or Matchbox car aficionado. These cases are meticulously crafted to fit the Hot Wheels or Matchbox short card collections, ensuring your prized possessions remain in mint condition.

image.alt: Example of a short card KLAS car keeper

content: Size: 1:64 suitable for Hot Wheels or Matchbox short cards.
Card Dimensions: 10.8cm x 10.8cm.
High-Quality Material: Crafted from 0.5mm thick recyclable PET plastic, the Short Card Keeper is durable and eco-friendly.
Full Protection: Each case snugly encloses the car and its card, while the crystal clear window perfectly showcases your collectible.
Easy Access: For those moments when you want a closer look, the case can be easily opened and resealed without compromising its integrity.
Storage & Display: Designed for convenience, these cases are stackable and come equipped with a hanger holder hole for those who love to display.

intro.content: KLAS Car Keepers Long Card protective cases are the epitome of protection for the serious Hot Wheels car collector. Specifically designed for the Hot Wheel long card collections, these cases are the perfect blend of style and security.

image.alt: Example of a long card KLAS car keeper

content: Size: 1:64 suitable for Hot Wheels long cards.
Card Dimensions: 16.5cm x 10.8cm.
High-Quality Material: Made from robust 0.5mm thick recyclable PET plastic, ensuring longevity and sustainability.
Full Protection: With a snug fit for both the card and car, the transparent window offers an unobstructed view of your cherished collectible.
Easy Access: Collector-friendly design allows for easy opening and resealing, balancing accessibility with top-notch protection.
Storage & Display: These cases are not only stackable for efficient storage but also come with a hanger holder hole for proud display.

intro.content: KLAS Car Keepers Team Transporter protective cases are the dream of every Hot Wheels enthusiast. Tailor-made for the Hot Wheels Team Transport cars and trucks collection, these cases are a testament to KLAS's commitment to quality and precision.

image.alt: Example of a team transport card KLAS car keeper

content: Size: 1:64 suitable for Hot Wheels Team Transport cars and trucks.
Card Dimensions: 20.3cm x 16.5cm.
High-Quality Material: Crafted from 0.7mm thick recyclable PET plastic, these protectors are built to last.
Full Protection: Each case is designed to offer secure protection for both the card and the vehicle, complemented by a crystal clear viewing window.
Easy Access: Collector-centric design ensures ease of access with simple opening and resealing mechanisms.
Storage & Display: With a stackable design for streamlined storage, these cases also sport a hanger holder hole for those who prefer to display.

intro.content: KLAS Car Keepers Premium Car Culture protective cases are tailor-made for the dedicated Hot Wheels car collector. These protectors are specially designed for the Hot Wheel Premium Car Culture or Boulevard car collections.

image.alt: Example of a premium case card KLAS car keeper

content: Size: 1:64 suitable for Hot Wheels Premium Car Culture cars.
Card Dimensions: 16.5cm x 13.5cm.
High-Quality Material: Like other KLAS protectors, the Premium Car Culture Keeper is made from 0.5mm thick recyclable PET plastic.
Full Protection: Each case offers complete and secure protection for both the card and the car, providing a crystal clear window to showcase your model.
Easy Access: Designed for collectors, it is easy to open and reseal, ensuring both accessibility and protection.
Storage & Display: Stackable design for optimal storage space, and comes with a hanger holder hole for display enthusiasts.
